description: Erection of single-storey side extension and side dormer roof extension with instalation of 3no side rooflights to facilitate loft conversion
decision_conditions: The proposed single storey side extension  would not comply with condition A.3 (a) (similar materials) of Class A, Part 1, Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended)

The proposed side dormer roof extension and installation of 3 nos side rooflights to facilitate loft conversion would not comply with condition B.2 (a) (similar materials) of Class B, Part 1, Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended)

The proposed side dormer roof extension and installation of 3 nos side rooflights to facilitate loft conversion would not comply with condition C.2 (a) and (b)  of Class C, Part 1, Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended)
